website_summaries.verdict: A great option if you're sensitive to ammonia, but still need an affordable and effective glass cleaner that doesn't leave streaks.
pros: Ammonia-free formula is tolerable for most users
Effectively cleans all types of glass
Value pack of 3 large bottles goes a long way
Spray bottles are easy to grip and use
cons: A handful of owners received leaky bottles in the 3-pack

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this "glass cleaner" more versatile than the famous one with ammonia but it does a much better job on a variety of surfaces. This works great on my stainless appliances as well on mirrors, countertops, and more. Has a pleasant scent and does not contain ammonia which for me is a big plus, no streaks with Glass Plus. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: coldmountain

customer_reviews.title: A great product, seems to be disappearing from grocers' shelves
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why GlassPlus is not carried in major supermarkets any more, but there are some tasks that only this product can handle. So, I ordered three bottles to avoid "running out" and never being able to find it again. Gentle cleaner, used even on hard wood floors (which have a polyurethane coating).
customer_reviews.author: MJCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: bottle not see thru
customer_reviews.text: well packaged-BUT bottle NOT see thru- entire neck is EMPTY-not sure if bottle is refillable -or how to get lid off- ?wrapper is deceiving hiding the low fill level-too bad it has disappeared from grocery stores
customer_reviews.author: north2alaska

customer_reviews.title: Best glass cleaner on Earth!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this glass cleaner before until the other day. I absolutely love this stuff!! Since it comes in a 3 pack, I have one in each bathroom, and one bottle under the kitchen sink. This is way better than Windex. It doesn’t streak, and it cleans the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Star Pellum

customer_reviews.title: Used to be a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Always have had good results with this product on glass and counters and metal surfaces. Cleans eye glasses well, too. Has now become hard to find since Johnson sold the brand. Hope the formula is the same. Haven't used the new ones yet. Will update if necessary,
customer_reviews.author: F. Kimper

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and refreshes mirrors and counters
customer_reviews.text: While I’d have preferred Windex this still cleans up and smells good. It doesn’t disinfect surfaces, but I am okay with it. It cleans the counter tops nicely. I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ctmom

customer_reviews.title: Works great on fingerprints too. Like on the microwave!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great on the windows and on stainless. It smells ok and the product worked well. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing lady

customer_reviews.title: Best all-purpose cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cleaner for windows, countertops, just about anything. I have been searching my local stores for months, and no one has it, so I was very happy to get it from you!
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Glass plus is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love Glass Plus! It cleans super well and no streaks! Iuse it on all my mirrors and glass! It's also great in all surfaces! I would highly recommend it! I have used it for years and have not been able to find it as of late, so was thrilled that Amazon carried it! ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Nini Walker

customer_reviews.title: Best glass cleaner ever.  Good for granite countertops too.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Glass Plus for years, and tried many other products for glass, kitchen, bathroom, etc. This always works the best, and after researching the ph for cleaning granite countertops, glass plus is the most neutral and won't harm the surface as many others will. Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Saves me money on my water bill.
customer_reviews.text: Many years ago, I got the opportunity to work in the pits at Laguna Seca up in Monterey, Ca . It was there that I learned of this product to keep the formula cars looking clean and sparkling bumper to bumper. So in California where we have water rationing, this is what I use to keep my cars looking good, and saves me on my water bills.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Golston

customer_reviews.title: That it really works well
customer_reviews.text: Best window and glass cleaner !! It really doesn’t streak !!

customer_reviews.title: Finding Glass Plus
customer_reviews.text: It's almost impossible to find this product in stores anymore. I have used this product for years and still believe the cleaning results are far better than other brands. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: For unknown reasons, this product is no longer available in area markets, so I'm thrilled to find it here. It is an amazing cleaner for glass, obviously, but it does a fantastic job eliminating grease and oil on the range.

product_meta.title: Glass Plus Glass Cleaner, 32 fl oz Bottle, Multi-Surface Glass Cleaner (Pack of 3)
feature_bullets: Glass cleaner for windows & glass surfaces
To use: spray soiled glass surface and wipe with dry paper towel, or lint-free cloth. Do not use on varnished surfaces.
Safe for use on: glass, windows, mirrors, clear plastic, computer screens, fiberglass & plexiglass.
